name: Sandwich Stackers
description:
In Sandwich Stackers the aim of the game is to get the largest stacked sandwich possible!

_________________________________________________________________________________________
 
STACK: Stack your sandwich by moving from left to right catching fillings as they fall!

STABILIZE: The taller you stack, the more unstable you will become. When you top off a stack with another piece of bread you'll stabilize all fillings underneath.

AVOID: Beware rotten fillings as they'll deduct  points from your score and dissolve a portion of your stack. If you catch three rotten fillings the game is over.

__________________________________________________________________________________________

GAME MODES:

Normal:

Catch filling to grow your stacker! Avoid rotten foods.

Vegetarian:

Avoid meat, every other filling is fair game!

Vegan:

You may only catch vegetables (and fruit if you count tomatoes ;D )

Meat Lovers:

You may only catch meat. MEEEEEEAAAAT..... And dairy I guess.

__________________________________________________________________________________________
